title: dheena dhayaaLO
sahitya:
dIna dayALO dIna dayALO dInadayApara dEva dayALO





caraNam 1



 kanakAmbara ghana shyAma dayALO sanakAdi muni yOgi vinuta dayALO

   



caraNam 2



 sharadhi bandhana rAmacanra dayALO varadAmara brnda vandya dayALO

   



caraNam 3



 nAradamuni dEva nAtha dayALO sArasAkSa raghunAtha dayALO

   



caraNam 4



 Agama kalpita amita dayALO bhOgishayana parama puruSa dayALO

   



caraNam 5



 gaganAntargata nAtha dayALO nigama gOcara nirvikAra dayALO

   



caraNam 6



 dashakaNTha luNThalOddaNDa dayALO kusha lava janakAkrUra dayALO

   



caraNam 7



 dasharatha suta lOkAdhAra dayALO pashupati cApa trTita dayALO

   



caraNam 8



 vara bhadrAdri nivAsa dayALO pAlita shrI rAmadAsa dayALO
